title: Team Page Header
custom_preconds: Given a user have selected a Team Page on iPhone
custom_steps: When a Team Page is loaded
custom_expected:
Then a team word mark will display in the top middle
and a persistent MLB.TV button will display on the upper left
and the Gameday Audio will display on the right
and you are able to switch teams using the drop-down arrow next to the team word mark
and the team color branding will be applied to the page
(CHECK FOR ALL TEAMS)

title: Buttons reflect Team's color
custom_preconds: Given the user is on a Team page on iPhone
custom_steps: When the user views the team page links and data
custom_expected:
Then the colors should match the one set for the team page

REPEAT FOR ALL TEAMS

title: Watermark
custom_preconds: Given a user is on a Team Page on iPhone
custom_steps: When a user swipes to the bottom of the Team Page
custom_expected:
Then the user will see the appropriate team logo watermark

Check all of the teams

title: Spanish Support
custom_preconds:
Given a user is on a Team Page
and the device is set to Spanish
custom_steps: When the user views the team page links and data
custom_expected: Then the data is in consistent with the Spanish mashup file

title: Smaller screen
custom_preconds:
- App is installed 
- User is on Team Page View on iOS MLB app
- User is on small screen phone
custom_steps: When the user navigates to team page and the team page initially loads
custom_expected:
Then the "featured" game will be displayed on the second date of the 4 dates on the date bar
And the 5th block will contain the Team's full Schedule

title: Larger screen
custom_preconds:
App is installed
User is on Team Page View on iOS MLB app
User is on larger screen  phone
custom_steps: When the user navigates to Team Page and the page initially loads
custom_expected:
- Then the user will be see 5 dates on the date bar
- The "featured" game will be displayed on the second date of the 5 dates on the date bar
- The 6th block will contain the Team's full Schedule

title: Current date on or before date range
custom_preconds:
- App is installed
- Login with a user whose Current date is on or before the beginning of the season (or date range)
custom_steps:
- When the user whose current date is  on or before the beginning of the season (or date range)
And the user opens the Team page
custom_expected: - "Featured" game will be the first game of the season and will be displayed in the first block of the date bar

title: Current date on or after date range
custom_preconds:
App is installed
Login with a user whose Current date is on or after the beginning of the season (or date range)
custom_steps:
When the current date is on or after the end of the season (or date range)
And the user opens the Team page
custom_expected:
Then the "featured" game will be the last game of the season
And will be displayed as the fourth block of the date bar (or fifth on the iPhone 6 Plus or the iphone with larger screen view)

title: Schedule block
custom_preconds:
App is installed
User is navigated on Team Page
custom_steps: When the user taps the Schedule block on the date bar
custom_expected: Then the user is taken to the Team's Schedule view (Calendar/List)

title: Scrolling feature
custom_preconds:
App is installed
User is on Team Page View on iOS MLB app
custom_steps: - Swipe the Game Details section to the left/right
custom_expected: - Date bar will scroll to the left/right and will highlight the game displaying below in the Game Details section

title: When current time is before 10 AM ET
custom_preconds:
- App is installed
- Make sure you set the time on your iphone before 10 AM (say 8 AM)
custom_steps:
When the user views the date bar
and the local, current time is before 10 AM
custom_expected:
Then the previous day's game will be located on the second date of the 4 dates on the date bar
and will be selected by default

title: When current time is after 10 AM ET
custom_preconds:
App is installed
Make sure user sets  the time on iphone after 10 AM or local time is after 10 am
custom_steps:
When the user views the date bar
And the local, current time is after 10 AM
custom_expected:
Then today's (or the next game) will be located on the second date of the 4 dates on the date bar
And will be selected by default

title: With no game scheduled for a date
custom_preconds:
App is installed
User is navigated on the Team Page
custom_steps:
When you look at the date bar
And there is no game scheduled for a date
custom_expected: Then the date with no game scheduled will be skipped on the date bar

custom_preconds:

custom_steps:

custom_expected: Then the Away game will display the opponent as "@OAK" (for example)

custom_steps:

title: When game is suspended
custom_preconds:

User is navigated on the Team Page

title: When game is suspended and resumed
custom_preconds:
App is installed
User is navigated on the Team Page
custom_steps:
When the user looks at the date bar
And there is a Suspended-Resumed game displayed
custom_expected:
The Resumed Game will be displayed in the cell for the date that the game is being played on
And when the user navigates to that cell, the date for the game will remain as the date the Resumed Game is scheduled to be played on
And it will NOT be displayed on the date that the original Suspended Game was played on
